original_text: Then the second angel made a sound with his trumpet. I saw something like a very big mountain that was burning with fire. This mountain fell down into the sea. A third of the sea became blood.
korean_text: 둘째 천사가 나팔을 부니 불 붙는 큰 산과 같은 것이 바다에 던져지매 바다의 삼분의 일이 피가 되고

sentences.original_text: Then the second angel made a sound
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 두 번째 천사가 소리를 냈습니다

sentences.original_text: I saw something like a very big mountain
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 아주 큰 산 같은 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: This mountain fell down into the sea
A third of the sea became blood
